page.title: 06Transport in Sigglesthorne
page.content: The main form of transport used by people in Sigglesthorne is the {private car.}People use cars to go to work,for shopping and for recreation. Some people have cars for special purposes; like Landrovers for farming work. The{bus service}takes some people to Hornsea and back.Children over 11 years old get a bus that takes them to Hornsea school daily. Some people work in Hornsea and Hull so they go to their work by cars, taxis or buses. The nearest{rail line,}about two miles away, was closed in 1965.The nearest {railway station }is 10 miles away in Beverley. The nearest commercial{Airport}is Humberside Airport approx 26 miles away.
